includedAssets.title: Pilot, Part 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Time travelling rogue Rip Hunter pulls together a disparate team of superheroes and villains to save the world from immortal tyrant Vandal Savage.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Time travelling rogue Rip Hunter pulls together a disparate team of superheroes and villains to save the world from immortal tyrant Vandal Savage.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Time travelling rogue Rip Hunter pulls together a disparate team of superheroes and villains to save the world from immortal tyrant Vandal Savage.

includedAssets.title: Pilot, Part 2
includedAssets.synopsis: As the action-packed superhero drama continues, the team get a tip-off as to Vandal Savage's whereabouts. But it's a very dangerous location indeed.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the action-packed superhero drama continues, the team get a tip-off as to Vandal Savage's whereabouts. But it's a very dangerous location indeed.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the action-packed superhero drama continues, the team get a tip-off as to Vandal Savage's whereabouts. But it's a very dangerous location indeed.

includedAssets.title: Blood Ties
includedAssets.synopsis: Sara finds a way to hit multimillionaire Vandal Savage where it really hurts. Snart has an ulterior motive when he sends Jax to steal a valuable gem.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sara finds a way to hit multimillionaire Vandal Savage where it really hurts. Snart has an ulterior motive when he sends Jax to steal a valuable gem.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sara finds a way to hit multimillionaire Vandal Savage where it really hurts. Snart has an ulterior motive when he sends Jax to steal a valuable gem.

includedAssets.title: White Knights
includedAssets.synopsis: The team head to Russia in the 1980s, where Vandal Savage has retreated behind the Iron Curtain and a string of nuclear scientists have vanished.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The team head to Russia in the 1980s, where Vandal Savage has retreated behind the Iron Curtain and a string of nuclear scientists have vanished.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team head to Russia in the 1980s, where Vandal Savage has retreated behind the Iron Curtain and a string of nuclear scientists have vanished.

includedAssets.title: Fail-Safe
includedAssets.synopsis: Snart and Sara attempt to rescue their fellow Legends from certain death in a Soviet gulag. Rip gives Sara a secret and potentially-fatal assignment.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Snart and Sara attempt to rescue their fellow Legends from certain death in a Soviet gulag. Rip gives Sara a secret and potentially-fatal assignment.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Snart and Sara attempt to rescue their fellow Legends from certain death in a Soviet gulag. Rip gives Sara a secret and potentially-fatal assignment.

includedAssets.title: Star City 2046
includedAssets.synopsis: The Legends see a horrific version of the future when they crash into Star City in 2046. Sara gets a further shock when she meets Oliver Queen.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Legends see a horrific version of the future when they crash into Star City in 2046.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Legends see a horrific version of the future when they crash into Star City in 2046. Sara gets a further shock when she meets Oliver Queen.

includedAssets.title: Marooned
includedAssets.synopsis: Ignoring the Legends' grave warnings, Rip throws the entire team into danger when he undertakes a risky plan to track down Vandal Savage.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ignoring the Legends' grave warnings, Rip throws the entire team into danger when he undertakes a risky plan to track down Vandal Savage.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ignoring the Legends' grave warnings, Rip throws the entire team into danger when he undertakes a risky plan to track down Vandal Savage.

includedAssets.title: Night Of The Hawk
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep8 - Night Of The Hawk
includedAssets.synopsis: Sara and Professor Stein go undercover when the team trace Vandal Savage to a small 1950s town that's being terrorised by a spate of murders.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sara and Professor Stein go undercover when the team trace Vandal Savage to a small 1950s town that's being terrorised by a spate of murders.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sara and Professor Stein go undercover when the team trace Vandal Savage to a small 1950s town that's being terrorised by a spate of murders.

includedAssets.title: Left Behind
includedAssets.synopsis: Ray, Sara and Kendra make surprising life choices when they are expectantly abandoned by their team in the 1950s.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ray, Sara and Kendra make surprising life choices when they are expectantly abandoned by their team in the 1950s.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ray, Sara and Kendra make surprising life choices when they are expectantly abandoned by their team in the 1950s.

includedAssets.title: Progeny
includedAssets.synopsis: The Legends struggle with their consciences when they find out they must kill a 14-year-old boy in order to save the world.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Legends struggle with their consciences when they find out they must kill a 14-year-old boy in order to save the world.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Legends struggle with their consciences when they find out they must kill a 14-year-old boy in order to save the world.

includedAssets.title: The Magnificent Eight
includedAssets.synopsis: Bounty hunter Jonah Hex shows up when the Legends encounter trouble in the Old West.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Bounty hunter Jonah Hex shows up when the Legends encounter trouble in the Old West.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Bounty hunter Jonah Hex shows up when the Legends encounter trouble in the Old West.

includedAssets.title: Last Refuge
includedAssets.synopsis: Rip makes a smart move when a deadly assassin threatens to erase the Legends from the timeline. Plus, a little more about Rip's past is revealed.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rip makes a smart move when a deadly assassin threatens to erase the Legends from the timeline. Plus, a little more about Rip's past is revealed.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Rip makes a smart move when a deadly assassin threatens to erase the Legends from the timeline. Plus, a little more about Rip's past is revealed.

includedAssets.title: Leviathan
includedAssets.synopsis: Rip spots a chance to end Vandal Savage's evil reign forever, when he takes the Legends far into the future.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rip spots a chance to end Vandal Savage's evil reign forever, when he takes the Legends far into the future.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Rip spots a chance to end Vandal Savage's evil reign forever, when he takes the Legends far into the future.

includedAssets.title: River Of Time
includedAssets.synopsis: Having finally ensnared immortal megalomaniac Vandal Savage, the Legends begin to divide over the best course of action.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Having finally ensnared immortal megalomaniac Vandal Savage, the Legends begin to divide over the best course of action.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Having finally ensnared immortal megalomaniac Vandal Savage, the Legends begin to divide over the best course of action.

includedAssets.title: Destiny
includedAssets.synopsis: The Time Masters' revelations start to make Rip and Rory feel incredibly disturbed. Meanwhile, Snart faces a moral dilemma.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Time Masters' revelations start to make Rip and Rory feel incredibly disturbed. Meanwhile, Snart faces a moral dilemma.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Time Masters' revelations start to make Rip and Rory feel incredibly disturbed. Meanwhile, Snart faces a moral dilemma.

includedAssets.title: Legendary
includedAssets.synopsis: As Vandal Savage sets his evil plan into motion, the Legends get one last chance to save the world. Explosive season finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Vandal Savage sets his evil plan into motion, the Legends get one last chance to save the world. Explosive season finale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Vandal Savage sets his evil plan into motion, the Legends get one last chance to save the world. Explosive season finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: When immortal villain Vandal Savage threatens to destroy everything in existence, time-traveller Rip Hunter assembles a misfit band of heroes and villains to save the world. Victor Garber, Brandon Routh, Arthur Darvill, Caity Lotz and Wentworth Miller star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When the immortal Vandal Savage threatens to destroy all existence, time-traveller Rip Hunter gathers a band of heroes and villains to save the world.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When immortal villain Vandal Savage threatens to destroy everything in existence, time-traveller Rip Hunter assembles a misfit band of heroes and villains to save the world. Victor Garber, Brandon Routh, Arthur Darvill, Caity Lotz and Wentworth Miller star.

includedIn.title: DC's Legends of Tomorrow
